text: Need Quinn Cook for Bunnings campaign. Budget around $21,427, looking for 3 x Radio interview, 2 x Twitter post, 3 x TV appearance, 3 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel. 4 week exclusivity from other similar brands.
